building_short_description_texts.short_description: Rest and renewal restores vigilance.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A store of supplies eliminates a potential weakness.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A fortress guards against enemies and enforces the law.

short_description.last_approved_text: One need never go hungry with a little knowledge and familiarity with the land.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: One need never go hungry with a little knowledge and familiarity with the land.

short_description.last_approved_text: Be ready, mobile and vigilant. Always.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Be ready, mobile and vigilant. Always.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The quick delivery of military supplies can prove decisive in the battles to come.

short_description.last_approved_text: Reward can be a surer bond than loyalty.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Reward can be a surer bond than loyalty.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To relax vigilance is to invite attack.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ignore the bypaths, for the path of the great Tao is straight ahead.

short_description.last_approved_text: Understanding is the key to many locks.

short_description.last_approved_text: A court held by a true master.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A court held by a true master.

short_description.last_approved_text: As power grows, so must tribute.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: As power grows, so must tribute.

short_description.last_approved_text: All rulers must have a throne, even bandit rulers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All rulers must have a throne, even bandit rulers.

short_description.last_approved_text: A hall befitting a future ruler.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A hall befitting a future ruler.

short_description.last_approved_text: Protection requires tribute.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Protection requires tribute.

short_description.last_approved_text: The underworld of trade is a pathway to possibilities most consider to be impossible.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The underworld of trade is a pathway to possibilities most consider to be impossible.

short_description.last_approved_text: There are none perfect in the world; only intentions are perfect.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There are none perfect in the world; only intentions are perfect.

short_description.last_approved_text: Know your enemy, says Master Sun Tzu, yet the practice is ever harder than the theory.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Know your enemy, says Master Sun Tzu, yet the practice is ever harder than the theory.

short_description.last_approved_text: The mind is a muscle, and must be trained as much as – and in conjunction with – the sword arm.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The mind is a muscle, and must be trained as much as – and in conjunction with – the sword arm.

short_description.last_approved_text: "This is our land, our home, our history. You cannot have it!"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "This is our land, our home, our history. You cannot have it!"

short_description.last_approved_text: Although their palisade walls are an unfortunate necessity, the Shanyue seek only to live in peace.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Although their palisade walls are an unfortunate necessity, the Shanyue seek only to live in peace.

short_description.last_approved_text: The modest defences give way to a place of spiritual meditation for would-be bandits.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The modest defences give way to a place of spiritual meditation for would-be bandits.

short_description.last_approved_text: As conflicts grow ever-more fierce, so too must even spiritual places grow ever-more well defended.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: As conflicts grow ever-more fierce, so too must even spiritual places grow ever-more well defended.

short_description.last_approved_text: Hide a stone among stones and a man among men.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Hide a stone among stones and a man among men.

short_description.last_approved_text: A simple mine, concealed and exploited for the benefit of the bandits.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A simple mine, concealed and exploited for the benefit of the bandits.

short_description.last_approved_text: Curious, for a mine to be so well-defended, but these are dangerous times.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Curious, for a mine to be so well-defended, but these are dangerous times.

short_description.last_approved_text: Nestled into the fissure, the mine bristles with defences both seen and unseen.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Nestled into the fissure, the mine bristles with defences both seen and unseen.

short_description.last_approved_text: Whilst this may seem an ordinary paddock, it is keenly watched and guarded at all times.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Whilst this may seem an ordinary paddock, it is keenly watched and guarded at all times.

short_description.last_approved_text: The only way to properly raise cavalry is through patience and constant vigilance.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The only way to properly raise cavalry is through patience and constant vigilance.

short_description.last_approved_text: A bandit army's strength derives from its mounted potential – many high quality horses are therefore essential.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A bandit army's strength derives from its mounted potential – many high quality horses are therefore essential.

short_description.last_approved_text: Inconspicuous to the untrained eye, within these walls is the business of extracting profit.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Inconspicuous to the untrained eye, within these walls is the business of extracting profit.

short_description.last_approved_text: Used and valued for thousands of years, the bandits now covet their copper behind tight defences.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Used and valued for thousands of years, the bandits now covet their copper behind tight defences.

short_description.last_approved_text: What value is mined from the earth will be defended at sword-point, if necessary.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: What value is mined from the earth will be defended at sword-point, if necessary.

short_description.last_approved_text: The beasts of burden drive industry and war; they are vital companions.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The beasts of burden drive industry and war; they are vital companions.

short_description.last_approved_text: A bandit army is no army at all if it cannot rely on its beasts.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A bandit army is no army at all if it cannot rely on its beasts.

short_description.last_approved_text: The mighty cavalry charge starts as the humble foal; all must be nurtured to greatness.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The mighty cavalry charge starts as the humble foal; all must be nurtured to greatness.

short_description.last_approved_text: Perhaps more than any Han soldier, bandits have need of armour to survive.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Perhaps more than any Han soldier, bandits have need of armour to survive.

short_description.last_approved_text: Bandits may rely on swift and powerful strikes, but all will benefit from a good chestplate.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Bandits may rely on swift and powerful strikes, but all will benefit from a good chestplate.

short_description.last_approved_text: With armour comparable to the Han's, then the bandits stand toe-to-toe with their enemies.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: With armour comparable to the Han's, then the bandits stand toe-to-toe with their enemies.

short_description.last_approved_text: When your business is war, then good, dependable weapons are a necessity.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When your business is war, then good, dependable weapons are a necessity.

short_description.last_approved_text: Bandits cannot trust their very livelihood to poor-quality weaponry. Weaponsmiths are highly-prized.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Bandits cannot trust their very livelihood to poor-quality weaponry. Weaponsmiths are highly-prized.

short_description.last_approved_text: A well-armed army is a strong army. This is a universal truth, ignored at a commander's peril.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A well-armed army is a strong army. This is a universal truth, ignored at a commander's peril.

short_description.last_approved_text: "It glints in the dark, against the rock, do you see? It is most precious…"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "It glints in the dark, against the rock, do you see? It is most precious…"

short_description.last_approved_text: Jade offers the connection between our world and the next; a lodestone to the beyond.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Jade offers the connection between our world and the next; a lodestone to the beyond.

short_description.last_approved_text: Jade has been valued in this world and beyond for thousands of years. It must be obtained and protected.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Jade has been valued in this world and beyond for thousands of years. It must be obtained and protected.

short_description.last_approved_text: When there is no war, there must instead be work, agriculture, and tools for those purposes.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When there is no war, there must instead be work, agriculture, and tools for those purposes.

short_description.last_approved_text: Be it ploughing a field or forging a sword, without the right tool you fumble like so many fools.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Be it ploughing a field or forging a sword, without the right tool you fumble like so many fools.

short_description.last_approved_text: Tools are not-so easily sourced by bandits as in the empire; they are therefore more valued than they otherwise might be.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Tools are not-so easily sourced by bandits as in the empire; they are therefore more valued than they otherwise might be.

short_description.last_approved_text: Farms run by soldiers to feed soldiers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Farms run by soldiers to feed soldiers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Quiet, considered tea-drinking lets one view the universe through every sip.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Quiet, considered tea-drinking lets one view the universe through every sip.

short_description.last_approved_text: Greater resources are needed to match a greater demand for tea.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Greater resources are needed to match a greater demand for tea.

short_description.last_approved_text: In the partaking of tea there is contemplation and, if the blend is good enough, understanding.

short_description.last_approved_text: The popularity of tea begs for greater crops.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The popularity of tea begs for greater crops.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A community dedicated to growing the finest tea.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Each step in the cultivation of tea determines its taste.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Nature provides a leaf to calm the mind and aid contemplation.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Tian guides us, through understanding of the self, to a life beyond.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Tian guides us, through understanding of the self, to a life beyond.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Embrace effortless action to achieve harmony with nature.

short_description.last_approved_text: Under heaven, all people are equal.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Under heaven, all people are equal.

short_description.last_approved_text: A town where all routes meet.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A town where all routes meet.

short_description.last_approved_text: New flavours from across the seas.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: New flavours from across the seas.

short_description.last_approved_text: Salt is a natural and vital preservative. In many places, it is more valuable than gold.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Salt is a natural and vital preservative. In many places, it is more valuable than gold.

short_description.last_approved_text: "These tiny white flakes will keep an army going for weeks, you'll see!"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "These tiny white flakes will keep an army going for weeks, you'll see!"

short_description.last_approved_text: Salt used to be exclusively the luxury of the emperor; now all may benefit from it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Salt used to be exclusively the luxury of the emperor; now all may benefit from it.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gold will not avail the needy trader when silk is the standard.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Gold will not avail the needy trader when silk is the standard.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Han pay their soldiers in bundles of silk, they say. How shall bandits pay theirs?

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Han pay their soldiers in bundles of silk, they say. How shall bandits pay theirs?

short_description.last_approved_text: "You can use it as currency or wear it. I bet they'll even be writing on it next!"

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "You can use it as currency or wear it. I bet they'll even be writing on it next!"

short_description.last_approved_text: "When the spice flow stops, all eyes will turn to desperation. This cannot happen."

building_short_description_texts.short_description: "When the spice flow stops, all eyes will turn to desperation. This cannot happen."

short_description.last_approved_text: The spice, as goes the eternal adage, absolutely must flow.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The spice, as goes the eternal adage, absolutely must flow.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is also said, most often, that they who control the spice, by extension then control the world.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is also said, most often, that they who control the spice, by extension then control the world.

short_description.last_approved_text: Valuable goods often arrive at these ports, along with so many other, undesirable things…

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Valuable goods often arrive at these ports, along with so many other, undesirable things…

short_description.last_approved_text: Whilst this is also home to a great deal of trade, it is also home to less salubrious clientele.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Whilst this is also home to a great deal of trade, it is also home to less salubrious clientele.

short_description.last_approved_text: A vast warehouse of merchant trade, both legal and less-than legal.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A vast warehouse of merchant trade, both legal and less-than legal.

short_description.last_approved_text: Though it may seem dull to many, there is nothing more important than farming to life in China.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Though it may seem dull to many, there is nothing more important than farming to life in China.

short_description.last_approved_text: In these troubled times, the grains must be protected against those who would see the crops burn.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In these troubled times, the grains must be protected against those who would see the crops burn.

short_description.last_approved_text: Grain farms are the lifeblood of a nation; if they are lost, so too is the struggle.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Grain farms are the lifeblood of a nation; if they are lost, so too is the struggle.

short_description.last_approved_text: The humble grain of rice carries with it the power to raise the desperate or fell the mighty.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The humble grain of rice carries with it the power to raise the desperate or fell the mighty.

short_description.last_approved_text: Bandits must prize their food supplies above all else – they will defend their paddies to the death.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Bandits must prize their food supplies above all else – they will defend their paddies to the death.

short_description.last_approved_text: Everybody has to eat. Even bandits. Perhaps especially bandits!

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Everybody has to eat. Even bandits. Perhaps especially bandits!

short_description.last_approved_text: A fisherman will almost certainly catch far more than just fish in these waters.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A fisherman will almost certainly catch far more than just fish in these waters.

short_description.last_approved_text: Give one a fish and they'll eat for a day. Show them a place to store fish, they'll probably fill it up.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Give one a fish and they'll eat for a day. Show them a place to store fish, they'll probably fill it up.

short_description.last_approved_text: A warehouse of fish. Fish, as far as the eye can see. Fish, fish, fish. Fish.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A warehouse of fish. Fish, as far as the eye can see. Fish, fish, fish. Fish.

short_description.last_approved_text: There are no animals more important to China than humble cows and pigs.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There are no animals more important to China than humble cows and pigs.

short_description.last_approved_text: Animals win wars just as much as any blade.

short_description.last_approved_text: Where would China be without the produce of the many animals kept on its farms?

short_description.last_approved_text: To be like bamboo, one must be willing to bend but never to break.

short_description.last_approved_text: "Let your mind be pliant, but your resolve unwavering. Move like bamboo, and you will see truth and victory."

short_description.last_approved_text: A tree can become a building, can become a weapon, can become a bowl. Truly, the most versatile material.

short_description.last_approved_text: To some, tea is essential part of life. To see the tea fields is to know that all is well.
